About Me

Digital Consultant & AI Specialist

Professional Background

I specialize in helping organizations navigate digital transformation through innovative technology solutions and AI-driven development. With expertise spanning AI/ML, cloud infrastructure, and software engineering, I deliver strategic insights and technical leadership that drives business growth.

Artificial Intelligence

Machine learning model development, NLP systems, computer vision solutions, and recommendation engines.

Cloud Architecture

Cloud-native application design, microservices architecture, serverless computing, and multi-cloud strategies.

Data Engineering

Big data processing, ETL pipeline development, data warehousing, and real-time analytics systems.

Digital Strategy

Digital transformation roadmaps, technology stack evaluation, and innovation frameworks.

Education

Master of Science in Computer Science

Stanford University, 2015-2017

Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with focus on natural language processing and computer vision applications.

Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering

University of Waterloo, 2011-2015

Graduated with honors, focusing on distributed systems and database design. Completed multiple industry internships as part of the co-op program.
